channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Newsom concedes skyrocketing healthcare costs for illegals are 'partial' contributor to Medicaid problem
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom said that the high MediCal spending is partly due to illegal immigrants being allowed to take part in the program, but th...

item.title: ‘Judicial Coup’ Threatens To Kneecap Trump’s America First Agenda
item.description: The United States is facing what El Salvador's President Nayib Bukele described as a "judicial coup."

item.title: If Anyone’s Destroying The Judiciary’s ‘Legitimacy,’ It’s Chief Justice John Roberts
item.description: Roberts' attempts to preserve what he views as the judiciary's 'legitimacy' are only destroying its credibility with the American people.

item.title: The Visitor Mocks the Illegal-Immigration Craze
item.description: Bruce LaBruce outstrips his contemporary political-film allies.

item.title: Pro-energy group urges AG Bondi to probe Biden's autopen on crucial decisions that devastated industry
item.description: Power the Future sent a letter to AG Bondi raising concerns over whether former President Biden used an autopen to sign energy-related executive order...

item.title: We Must Restore the U.S. Agency for Global Media, Not Eliminate It
item.description: Repressive regimes have failed to block the agency’s promotion of freedom around the world. Doing so ourselves could have drastic consequences.

item.title: Why Trump Doesn’t Want Judicial Review of His Deportation of Venezuelans
item.description: The president’s legal position that he can proceed with no input from Congress or judicial review is on shaky ground.

item.title: West Virginia, Wyoming Secure Elections With Ranked-Choice Voting Prohibitions
item.description: GOP governors of West Virginia and Wyoming signed bills on Tuesday prohibiting the use of ranked-choice voting in their states' elections.

item.title: Milei Isn’t Out of the Woods Yet
item.description: Milei has not yet been able to rid Argentina of its maze of capital controls, despite his promises to do so.

item.title: House Democrat demands answers on Musk, DOGE alleged conflicts of interest
item.description: Rep. Gerry Connolly is demanding answers on how Elon Musk and his Department of Government Efficiency are dealing with potential conflicts of interest...

item.title: Fox News Politics: DeSantis Calls on Congress to Rein in Courts
item.description: Welcome to the Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump administration, Capitol Hill and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: NASA astronauts stranded in space due to Biden's 'lack of courage,' White House says
item.description: The astronauts remained stranded at the International Space Station — until Tuesday when they parachuted down to Earth off the coast of Florida.

item.title: Bannon promotes Trump 2028, eschewing critics casting it as an unconstitutional pipe dream
item.description: Steve Bannon is not giving up on his dream of President Trump finding a way to circumvent the Constitution to serve another term in the White House.

item.title: An Unwelcome Fight Over Obeying Court Orders
item.description: Even the righteous cause of deporting brutal Venezuelan gangs should not tempt the executive branch to undermine the legitimate role of courts.
